title: Griffon
description: Large, rapacious predators combining the features of an eagle (head, wings, front claws) and a lion. Prey on horses.
extras: Attack horses: Within 120’, unless a morale check is passed.	Defend nest: Attack if it is approached.	Taming: Captured young can be trained as loyal mounts. Their fierce nature cannot be trained out: they still instinctively attack horses.
